lead_paragraph: UBS said on Sunday that it planned to hire executives from Goldman Sachs and Bank of America to build its mortgages and lending business in the United States.
snippet: UBS said on Sunday that it plans to hire executives from Goldman Sachs and Bank of America to build its mortgages and lending business in the United States.

headline.main: UBS to Hire Goldman and BofA Executives

abstract: UBS said on Sunday that it plans to hire executives from Goldman Sachs and Bank of America to build its mortgages and lending business in the United States.
